alert.note: Alert for Alexander; Franklin; Jackson; Johnson; Perry; Union; Williamson (Illinois) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Paducah (Southern Illinois and Indiana, Southeastern Missouri and Western Kentucky)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued April 05 at 4:18AM CDT until April 05 at 5:00AM CDT by NWS Paducah
info.description: The National Weather Service in Paducah has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southeastern Perry County in south central Illinois... Union County in southern Illinois... Northwestern Johnson County in southern Illinois... Western Williamson County in southern Illinois... Jackson County in southern Illinois... Northwestern Alexander County in southern Illinois... Southwestern Franklin County in south central Illinois... Southeastern Perry County in southeastern Missouri... Central Cape Girardeau County in southeastern Missouri... * Until 500 AM CDT. * At 418 AM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 6 miles west of Elkville to near Gordonville, moving northeast at 55 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Trained weather spotters near Grand Tower. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Cape Girardeau, Carbondale, Jackson, Herrin, Murphysboro, Carterville, Anna, Christopher, Jonesboro, Trail Of Tears State Park, Zeigler, De Soto, Crainville, Cambria, Cobden, Royalton, Energy, Elkville, Hurst and Dongola. This includes the following highways... Interstate 57 in Illinois between Mile Markers 23 and 39. Interstate 55 between Mile Markers 94 and 110. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 900 AM CDT for southern and south central Illinois...and southeastern Missouri. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 900 AM CDT for southern and south central Illinois...and southeastern Missouri.
